titles.title: VARIANCE Act
VARIANCE Act
Vehicle Axle Redistribution Increases Allow New Capacities for Efficiency Act
To amend title 23, United States Code, to establish an axle weight variance for certain commercial motor vehicles transporting dry bulk goods, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
Vehicle Axle Redistribution Increases Allow New Capacities for Efficiency Act or the VARIANCE Act
This bill allows commercial motor vehicles transporting dry bulk goods to operate on the Interstate Highway System with up to 110% of the maximum authorized weight on any axle or axle group.
